attributes.action: properly represent the taxpaying public and stop the costs of the psychiatrist who is 'on retainer' for stressed out expenses fraudsters being passed on to the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs brought this stress on themselves through fiddling the taxpayer yet they expect the psychiatrist who has been appointed to look after them for their self inflicted injury to be paid for by the same taxpayer.  Almost as bad as Gorbals Mick using taxpayer money to fund legal action against the taxpayer finding out how this lot are spending our money.  Continually absolutely UNBELIEVABLE.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
